subject: p13353878
Findings: AP upright and lateral views of the chest were provided. The lungs are clear. The heart is normal in size. Superior mediastinum appears widened, which could be due to thyroidal enlargement as seen on prior CT. Bony structures appear intact. There are prominent anterior spurs noted, however, in the mid T-spine.
